value.title: How do you conditionally highlight a bar in a Power BI Report?
value.excerpt: There are different interactions Power BI visuals can have, but how do we conditionally highlight a bar in a Power BI report using a slicer? value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Data source, Dataset and parameters

value.title: Export the Data of a Power BI table entirely in a few Clicks
